## second() function

Returns the second of the given two arguments. Useful as a `join` function for `then`<!-- -->. See also `preceded`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function second<T1, T2>(x: T1, y: T2): T2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>T1</code> | Argument to ignore |
|  y | <code>T2</code> | Argument to return |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T2`
